title: Airwheel Pro Electric Skateboards Complete M3 for Modern Citizens
text: Airwheel Pro Electric Skateboards Complete M3 for Modern Citizens , 24 October 2015 -- In ancient times, the four-wheel wagons were once the major means of travelling in some countries. After Industrial Revolution, cars have become more popular in human beings’ life.In ancient times, the four-wheel wagons were once the major means of travelling in some countries. After Industrial Revolution, cars have become more popular in human beings’ life. In the intelligent age, Airwheel has launched the motorized skateboards M3 on its New Product Release Conference on Sep 29<sup>th</sup>, 2015. Airwheel electric skateboards M3 are the new four-wheel vehicles for modern citizens. Skateboard is one of the extreme sports. It was developed from surfing in 1960s. And now it has become the coolest sport among young people. Different from the traditional four-wheel skateboard, Airwheel M3 are wireless remote control skateboards. Airwheel M3 has 2.4G handheld wireless remote controls. The effective distance of M3’s remote control is 10 meters. Users can easily control the speed and directions of skateboards with the remote controls. Moreover, Airwheel M3 still uses magnetic levitation motors, which bring more powerful output power with the speed of 20 miles per hour and more than 30°climbing degree. As a result, Airwheel M3 can be used for not only sports, but also transport tools. In addition, the customized high-end Cheng Shin tyres make users’ trips on Airwheel M3 safer and smoother. Apart from the feature of skid proof and strong road-holding performance, the thread of tires is designed to be wider. And all the wheels of M3 are all equipped with shock absorption and high elastic designs. So Airwheel maple electric skateboards can respond immediately and effectively to the bump roads. They have strong traffic ability. That means M3 can deal with a variety of road conditions well. Complete Skateboards M3 are the latest innovation of Airwheel in movable traffic field. They have totally changed people’s understanding of skateboards. Owing to the intelligence, Modern citizens will fall in love with the new four-wheel vehicles- Airwheel electric skateboards M3. About: Established in 2004, Airwheel Technology was initiated by a group of pioneers who took constant adventure to reshape the world with edged technology. With a global view, the U.S.-based enterprise started to build since its establishment R&D centers located in L.A., Beijing, and Changzhou, a marketing center in Beijing and a manufacturing center in Changzhou. As the leader in global portable intelligent transport industry, we have been dedicated to extend the fun and benefit of cutting-edge technology to everywhere in the world.
